name: The Hardly Fair
description:
Welcome to The Hardly Fair 

Where you might get an awful scare 

We hope that you complete your goal 

Or we will have to take your soul

Every 10 seconds a random challenge is picked for our hosts pleasure. Complete it before the time runs out or you will lose a life. Lose all your lives and your soul is ours forever!

Controls:

WASD - Movement (same for maze)  

Space - Jump  

Left Mouse Click - Shooting the cannon and selecting items

We hope you enjoy your time at The Hardly Fair. Let us know your best score!
